author: taylor
msg: cleanup of TestAggregator, for instance it was initializing Spring twice
also properly create the Request Context via the Request Context component
now we need to start looking into a way to assert the content rendered
perhaps we need a buffer service that will help us look at the rendered content, which can also provide for better content caching

author: rgrabowski
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-107. Added ExceptionEvaluator that triggers a BufferingAppenderSkeleton to flush its buffer when a certain Exception is detected.
